About Blog Photography

Hi, I’m Mark

(Add photo)

I’m an RL Engineer at Anyscale, working on RLlib enabling the scaling of reinforcement learning agents from research to production.

In my free time, I led maintenance of Gymnasium & Gym, the standard APIs powering RL research worldwide, and a core team member at the Farama Foundation. Recently, I’ve branched out into Jax-first RL, working to build Vamos and CleanJaxRL, a next generation RL API and suite of easily readable RL training algorithms respectively.

In 2025, I completed my PhD in Explainable RL at the University of Southampton, exploring how to explain agents’ decision-making about their future intentions and still have an active interest in RL and AI research.

Selected Projects

Gymnasium

An API standard for single-agent reinforcement learning environments, with popular reference environments and related utilities (formerly Gym).

Python Lead Maintainer
Arcade Learning Environment

A platform for AI research using Atari 2600 games as benchmarks for reinforcement learning algorithms.

C++ Maintainer
Vamos

An API for JAX-based Reinforcement Learning Environments.

Python Developer
CleanJaxRL

A suite of RL training algorithms written purely in JAX to enable end-to-end JIT and vmapping.

Python Developer
